abstract: Richard M. Schulze, who founded the company with a single audio equipment store in 1966, announced on Monday a proposal that would give the company a market value of $8.8 billion.
snippet: Richard M. Schulze, who founded the company with a single audio equipment store in 1966, announced on Monday a proposal that would give the company a market value of $8.8 billion.
lead_paragraph: Best Buy has been troubled by declining sales and growing competition from the likes of Wal-Mart Stores and Amazon.com.

headline.main: Best Buy Founder Makes Bid for a Takeover
